plugins.name: randroid-loop
plugins.description: Autonomous development loop with research and implementation modes. Self-sustaining agentic workflow that uses a dots system for task tracking, supports multiple git workflows, and can run infinitely or until completion.

plugins.name: godot
plugins.description: Develop, test, build, and deploy Godot 4.x games. Includes GdUnit4 testing, PlayGodot automation, web/desktop exports, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment to Vercel/GitHub Pages/itch.io.
